articles.title: NASA study finds ancient life could survive 50 million years in Martian ice
articles.description: Mars’ frozen ice caps may be time capsules for ancient life. articles.description: After cartel-related violence shut down travel in Puerto Vallarta, Edmonton families say they’ve been stuck for days trying to get home.
